name: Lost Gold (itch) (CasuallyJeffing)
description:
In association with
Kat21, Kit2K2, BaueFranco and Mojo_GameDesign

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Lost Gold is an exciting adventure game that takes you on a thrilling journey through a dark and mysterious cave.  As the player, you take on the role of a treasure hunter who has set out to explore the depths of the cave in search of the legendary lost treasure.

However, as you venture deeper into the cave, you soon discover that you are not alone. Rival pirates have also arrived in search of the treasure, and they will stop at nothing to get their hands on it. Along the way, you will encounter a number of funny easter eggs and moments that will keep you entertained and engaged in the game.

So, if you are ready to embark on an epic treasure hunt, and don't mind a little competition, Lost Gold is the perfect game for you. Will you be able to find the treasure before the rival pirates? Only time will tell!
